channel.title: Sorting on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Sorting on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 719 Find K Th Smallest Pair Distance
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 719 Question The distance of a pair of integers a and b is defined as the absolute difference between a and b.

item.title: Problem 3016 Minimum Number of Pushes to Type Word II
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3016 Question You are given a string word containing lowercase English letters.

item.title: Problem 1508 Range Sum of Sorted Subarray Sums
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1508 Question You are given the array nums consisting of n positive integers.

item.title: Problem 912 Sort an Array
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 912 Question TLDR: Given an integer array nums, sort it in ascending order.

item.title: Problem 2191 Sort the Jumbled Number
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2191 Question You are given a 0-indexed integer array mapping which represents the mapping rule of a shuffled decimal system.

item.title: Problem 1636 Sort Array by Increasing Frequency
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1636 Question Given an array of integers nums, sort the array in increasing order based on the frequency of the values.

item.title: Problem 2418 Sort the People
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2418 Question You are given an array of strings names, and an array heights that consists of distinct positive integers.

item.title: Problem 1509 Minimum Difference Between Largest and Smallest Value in Three Moves
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1509 Question You are given an integer array nums.

item.title: Problem 350 Intersection of Two Arrays II
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 350 Question Given two integer arrays nums1 and nums2, return an array of their intersection.

item.title: Problem 2285 Maximum Total Importance of Roads
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2285 Question You are given an integer n denoting the number of cities in a country.

item.title: Problem 826 Most Profit Assigning Work
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 826 Question You have n jobs and m workers.

item.title: Problem 945 Minimum Increment to Make Array Unique
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 945 Question You are given an integer array nums.

item.title: Problem 2037 Minimum Number of Moves to Seat Everyone
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2037 Question There are n seats and n students in a room.

item.title: Problem 75 Sort Colors
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 75 Question Given an array nums with n objects colored red, white, or blue, sort them in-place so that objects of the same color are adjacent, with the colors in the order red, white, and blue.

item.title: Problem 1122 Relative Sort Array
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1122 Question Given two arrays arr1 and arr2, the elements of arr2 are distinct, and all elements in arr2 are also in arr1.

item.title: Problem 1051 Height Checker
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1051 Question A school is trying to take an annual photo of all the students.

item.title: Problem 846 Hand of Straights
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 846 Question Alice has some number of cards and she wants to rearrange the cards into groups so that each group is of size groupSize, and consists of groupSize consecutive cards.
